name: Idle Miner Tycoon - Mine Manager Simulator
name_original: Idle Miner Tycoon - Mine Manager Simulator
description:
Have you ever wondered how to be an effective manager? Become an industrial tycoon by managing your mine and idle profit and win enough money to make your dreams come true!
Expand your millionaire empire and give your productivity a boost with specialized managers who will automate the workflow of your mine! Take on this challenge and discover the best strategy to invest and earn as much cash as possible - online and offline!

Idle Miner Tycoon is a simulation game that mixes mining management with money investment to gain profit and become a famous millionaire. The aim of this miner strategy simulator is to build and optimize resources to gain as much productivity and benefits as possible: With the income you make, you will have to hire and pay managers and miners, upgrade your mines and mining buildings and equipment as well as optimize your workflow for the perfect timing of the whole mining and management process. Become a mine manager tycoon capitalist, build a millionaire empire, and earn a massive profit. Gain some earnings and invest now in this miner manager simulator!

FEATURES OF IDLE MINER TYCOON
★ Automate your workflow to increase your idle income: No need to tap and tap like in an online casual clicker simulator!
★ Get idle cash and earn money: Continue conducting business even when you are offline!
★ Profit from a smart investment or two to boost your economy and win lots of rewards!
★ Hire managers to increase your workers’ motivation!
★ Every manager has a special tycoon booster: Increase worker productivity!
★ Prestige feature and different levels: Build up your billionaire empire simulation!
★ Manage more than 20 cool mines like a real boss: Become a mining tycoon magnate by managing this mine business simulator!
★ Mine for more than 15 different resources: coal, gold, ruby, moonstone, amethyst, crystal, and jade!
★ Collect masses of coal and gold in this money and income management simulator!
★ No Internet connection needed: Produce wealth online or offline!
★ Climb the leaderboard and become the richest industrial manager in the world!

Seize the chance to become a billionaire by automating the mine workflow of your business without the need to tap constantly. Get rich, purchase new mines and buy buildings, invest cash, and become the greatest mine manager tycoon ever in this addictive strategy simulator!
